main event: A military pilot flying a T-36D aircraft observed a yellow-white metallic disc-shaped object in January 1958.
interesting points: The object was described as having an almond shape resembling two pie tins placed together with inverted rims.,The pilot was an instructor and was flying with a student at the time of the sighting.,The object changed its position above and below the aircraft repeatedly.,The sighting lasted approximately 7 minutes.,No further investigation was directed by headquarters after the report.
